content.html: Your password must contain one letter, one uppercase letter, one number, one special character, one grawlix used in an Andy Capp comic where he stubs his toe, a currency symbol for a country that 40% of Americans haven’t heard of, and an ASCII picture of something naughty.
content.value: Your password must contain one letter, one uppercase letter, one number, one special character, one grawlix used in an Andy Capp comic where he stubs his toe, a currency symbol for a country that 40% of Americans haven’t heard of, and an ASCII picture of something naughty.
